version_description:
-Introducing Tech Tree, which made in very unique way to level up and unlock new ships.
-Added alternative teamplay mode, unlocks after level 5.
-Many bug fixes and small improvements.

Added tech tree branch with new sharpshooter battleships: New York, Scharnhorst, Nelson, Hood!
This group of battleships is known for tremendous power of the guns. Their main caliber is more powerful, more accurate and faster than regular battleships, and instead of side guns they are equipped with additional gun amplifiers or maneuvers. Terrible at a long distance, and very vulnerable in close combat.
- Added Lucky Spin.
- Added US network region for better ping.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

Added tech tree branch with new sharpshooter battleships: New York, Scharnhorst, Nelson, Hood!
This group of battleships is known for tremendous power of the guns. Their main caliber is more powerful, more accurate and faster than regular battleships, and instead of side guns they are equipped with additional gun amplifiers or maneuvers. Terrible at a long distance, and very vulnerable in close combat.
- Added Lucky Spin.
- Added US network region for better ping.
- Bug fixes and improvements.

In this update, we introduce a new class of ships - Submarines! This is a very special naval ships with its unique gameplay and abilities. Dive under the water and deliver unexpected strikes with various torpedo weapons. 4 new submarines, new special abilities and new weapons. Available after the Destroyers tech tree.

Match making screen and shop UI improvements.
Now you can buy boosters right after ship respawn.
As a reward for the battle you will now receive oil. and then open containers!
A new ship horn “We will sink you!” has been added to the container.
Submarines bug fixes and other improvements.
Support for new iOS, Bug fixes.
